name: Particles
description: The Particles component allows the user to create animated backgrounds or visual effects in the application.

properties.name: autoPlay
properties.label: Auto Play
properties.settingTooltip: Select to start animations automatically.

properties.name: fullScreen
properties.label: Full Screen
properties.settingTooltip: Select to set the background to the full window size.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.label: Z Index
properties.settingTooltip: The CSS z-index property set to the canvas.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.label: Background Color
properties.settingTooltip: Set the background color of the canvas.

properties.name: backgroundOpacity
properties.label: Background Opacity
properties.settingTooltip: Set the opacity of canvas background.

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.settingTooltip: The width of the canvas.

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height
properties.settingTooltip: The height of the canvas.

properties.name: duration
properties.label: Duration
properties.settingTooltip: The particles effect duration in seconds.

properties.name: delay
properties.label: Delay
properties.settingTooltip: The initial delay before starting the animation.

properties.name: shape
properties.label: Shape
properties.settingTooltip: Define the shape of the particles.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the shape(s) of the particles.

properties.name: number
properties.label: Number
properties.settingTooltip: Set the number of particles displayed on the canvas.

properties.name: size
properties.label: Size
properties.settingTooltip: Set the particle size.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine particle size.

properties.name: color
properties.label: Color
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the color(s) of particles.
properties.settingTooltip: Set the color of particles.

properties.name: opacity
properties.label: Opacity
properties.settingTooltip: Set the opacity of particles.

properties.name: colorAnimation
properties.label: Color Animation
properties.settingTooltip: Enable animation of particle color.

properties.name: move
properties.label: Move
properties.settingTooltip: Enable particle movement.

properties.name: speed
properties.label: Speed
properties.settingTooltip: Set the speed of particle movement.

properties.name: direction
properties.label: Direction
properties.settingTooltip: Select the direction of particle movement.

properties.name: outModes
properties.label: Out Modes
properties.settingTooltip: Set the particle out mode.

properties.name: rotate
properties.label: Rotate
properties.settingTooltip: Rotate particles by a random angle.

properties.name: rotationAnimation
properties.label: Rotation Animation
properties.settingTooltip: Enable animation of particle rotation.

properties.name: rollingAnimation
properties.label: Rolling Animation
properties.settingTooltip: Enable particle rolling animation.

properties.name: lineLinksVisibility
properties.label: Line Links Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Enable particle links.

properties.name: triangleLinksVisibility
properties.label: Triangle Links Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Fills the triangles made by link lines.

properties.name: linksColor
properties.label: Links Color
properties.settingTooltip: Set the color of the links.

properties.name: collisionMode
properties.label: Collision Mode
properties.settingTooltip: Set the particle collision mode.

properties.name: textValue
properties.label: Text Value(s)
properties.settingTooltip: Specify a particle value(s) for the Text shape.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the text particles. The value(s) returned by the handler will be used as the particles for the Text shape.

properties.name: imageURL
properties.label: Image URL(s)
properties.settingTooltip: Specify the image source for Image shape.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the image source for particles. The value(s) returned by the handler will be used for the Image shape.

properties.name: preset
properties.label: Presets
properties.settingTooltip: Choose a particle preset. Set to Basic to adjust the particles.

properties.name: customOptions
properties.label: Custom Options
properties.settingTooltip: Set your own particle configuration.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the options for particles. The value returned by the handler will be used as the particle configuration.

eventHandlers.name: onLoad
eventHandlers.label: On Load Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when particles are correctly loaded in canvas.
